#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
set<long long >s;
set<long long >::iterator it,ti;
int main() {
	long long t,i,j,k,n,c,flag,dif,a;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{ s.clear();
		
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		 {
		 	cin>>a;
		 	s.insert(a);
		 }
          it=s.begin();
		ti=s.begin();		 
		 if(s.size()==1)
		  cout<<"GOOD";
		 else if(s.size()>=3)
		  cout<<"BAD";
		 else
		 {dif=*(++ti)-(*(it));
		 	if(dif>=2)
		 	 cout<<"BAD";
		 	else
		 	 cout<<"GOOD";
		 }
		 cout<<endl;
	}
	
	
	
	
	return 0;
}
